Here is Tajikistan-China cargo Terminal located. Talk with truck drivers. Direct lifts to Dushanbe, Khujand, Pejikent, Murgab.

siberian_explorer

Works pretty well. The Taliban will help you. Not as many taxis as closer to the city, but people might still ask for money. The heat is unbearable, but looking like a foreigner really helps with getting picked up quickly.
